data.title: Schneider Funeral Home & Crematory
data.meta_description: Explore Life Stories, Offer Condolences & Send Flowers with Schneider Funeral Home & Crematory obituaries and Death Notices for the La Cygne, KS area.

About Us

Schneider Funeral Home & Crematory is a collection of obituaries for La Cygne, Pleasanton and Mound City, Kansas. With services throughout Kansas that are updated regularly. Find local obituaries and join us in celebrating memories and honoring their lives and legacies
